servinfo.title: DTC P1621: Immobilizer Communication Line Error

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Immobilizer Control System Wiring Circuit Diagram:Petrol Engine Model

entry.ptxt: Communication error between ICM and ECM is detected by ECM.

item.ptxt: Open in power supply wire circuit
Short to ground wire circuit in communication wire circuits
Short to power supply wire circuit in communication wire circuits

test1.ptxt: Clear DTC(s) referring to DTC Clearance:Petrol Engine Model .
Turn ignition switch to OFF position.
Check if any DTC is detected referring to DTC Check:Petrol Engine Model .
Check if any related fuse is blown.

action.ptxt: Replace blown fuse(s) with new one(s).

test1.ptxt: Disconnect ICM connector “G24” referring to Immobilizer Control Module (ICM) Removal and Installation:Petrol Engine Model .
Check if wire connections are normal at ICM connector “G24”.
Disconnect ECM connector “E23”.
- M16A and J20A models:
- J24B model:
- N32A model:
Check for proper following terminal connections to ECM connector.

item.ptxt: M16A, J20A and J24B model: “E23-13” and “E23-28”

testgroup.title: Check for open in power supply wire circuit

test1.ptxt: Connect ICM connector “G24” referring to Immobilizer Control Module (ICM) Removal and Installation:Petrol Engine Model .
With the ignition switch at ON position, check voltage between “G24-1” wire terminal at ICM and body ground.

testgroup.question: Is voltage about 12 V?

action.ptxt: Repair open in power supply wire circuit.

testgroup.title: Check for open in ground wire circuit

test1.ptxt: With the ignition switch at ON position, check voltage between “G24-2” wire terminal at ICM and body ground.

testgroup.question: Is voltage 0 V?

action.ptxt: Repair open in ground wire circuit.

testgroup.title: Check for short to ground circuit in communication wire circuit

test1.ptxt: With ICM connector “G24” and ECM connector “E23” disconnected, check resistance between “G24-4” / “G24-3” wire terminal at ICM connector and body ground.

testgroup.question: Is resistance infinite?

action.ptxt: Repair short to ground wire circuit in communication wire circuit.

testgroup.title: Check for short to power circuit in communication wire circuit

test1.ptxt: With ICM connector “G24” and ECM connector “E23” disconnected, turn the ignition switch to ON position.
Check voltage between “G24-4” / “G24-3” wire terminal at ICM connector and body ground.

testgroup.question: Is voltage 0 V?

action.ptxt: Repair short to power supply wire circuit in communication wire circuit.

testgroup.title: Check for short of communication wire circuit

test1.ptxt: With ICM connector “G24” and ECM connector “E23” disconnected, check resistance between “G24-3” wire terminal and “G24-4” wire terminal at ICM connector.

testgroup.question: Is resistance infinite?

action.ptxt: Repair short of communication wire circuits.

testgroup.title: Check for open in communication wire circuit

test1.ptxt: Disconnect ICM connector “G24” referring to Immobilizer Control Module (ICM) Removal and Installation:Petrol Engine Model .
Disconnect ECM connector “E23”.
- M16A and J20A models:
- J24B model:
- N32A model:
Check resistance between following terminal at ICM connector and ECM connector with ignition switch ON.

item.ptxt: M16A, J20A and J24B model: “G24-4” and “E23-13” (“PNK/BLU”) wire terminal /

testgroup.question: Is resistance infinite?

action.ptxt: Repair open in communication wire circuit.

test1.ptxt: Check ICM referring to Inspection of Immobilizer Control Module (ICM) and Its Circuit:Petrol Engine Model .

paragroup.ptxt: Then perform Procedure after ECM Replacement:Petrol Engine Model .

action.ptxt: Replace ICM with new one referring to Immobilizer Control Module (ICM) Removal and Installation:Petrol Engine Model .
